document_data.name: Abbai Abbathor
document_data.mainbody: '''Abbai Abbathor''' was a [[dwarven]] temple dedicated to the [[Morndinsamman]] deity of greed, [[Abbathor]], in the independent city of [[Teziir]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description:
The holy house was actually a series of short, stone buildings of dwarven architecture, with tall, spiked iron fences.

Within the ''abbai'' was a trading post where the dwarves dealt their precious [[gem]]s and [[magic item]]s. The friendly and amiable [[priest]]s of the Trove Lord were also unscrupulous merchants, who preyed upon the gullible and naive patrons who visited their mercantile house of worship.
